main event: A bright silver object was observed moving slowly across the sky from north to south. The object appeared to be approximately the same size as the full moon and was pulsating with a brilliant white light.
interesting points: The object appeared to be very high in the sky, much higher than any aircraft the witness had ever seen.
The light of the object sometimes seemed to flash or blink.
The sighting was observed by several other people in the area, including a Catholic priest and his housekeeper, and they all agreed on what was seen.
The witness is a mature adult who is not given to imagining things and is quite sure of what was seen.
The incident was reported to the Air Force's Project Blue Book, but their response indicated there was no correlation between the sighting and the recent power failure in the area.
witnesses: Several people, including a farmer, a Catholic priest, and his housekeeper
